oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: The Red Foley Show - 1958-07
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The Red Foley Show, originally broadcast in July of 1958. Featuring Red Foley (host/performer), Joe Slattery (announcer), Faron Young (performer), the Jordanaires (performers), Wanda Jackson (performer), and the Slim Wilson Band (performers). An NBC syndication originating at WSM (Nashville, Tenn.)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Red Foley; Faron Young; Wanda Jackson; Slim Wilson Band; Jordanaires
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Test tones -- [Unidentified NBC announcements] -- Opening statement -- Salty Dog Rag (Red Foley) -- Red Foley talks -- Trolene commercial (Joe Slattery) -- Red Foley introduces Wanda Jackson -- A Poor Man's Roses, A Rich Man's Gold (Wanda Jackson) -- Red Foley talks about the band and introduces Slim Wilson's band -- Walking Home (Slim Wilson Band) -- Red Foley introduces Faron Young -- Foley and Young talk and introduce the next tune -- All Alone With You (Faron Young) -- Red Foley talks -- Dowpon grass killer commercial (Joe Slattery) -- Joe Slattery introduces the next tune -- If I Can Help Somebody (Red Foley) -- Red Foley talks and introduces the Jordanaires -- A Wonderful Time UP There (Jordanaires) -- Corlan fly killer commercial (Joe Slattery) -- Done Gone (Slim Wilson Band) -- Red Foley talks about the weather in July and introduces the next tune -- Walking In The Cold, Cold Rain (Red Foley) -- Closing statement (Red Foley) -- Dow Chemical Company commercial (Joe Slattery) -- NBC callsign and tone
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Red Foley show (Radio program); WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Foley, Red, 1910-1968; Young, Faron; Jordanaires (Musical group); Jackson, Wanda, 1937-; Wilson, Slim; Slattery, Joe;
